entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:39 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 1:38 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: E 33 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
